contentHeader.name: Plc Structured Text Cheatsheet
contentHeader.author: Toni Kucic
contentHeader.Comment: Cheatsheet for programming a PLC in IEC61131-3 Structured text. Contains usage of operators and common functions.

ProjectInformation.property: Cheatsheet for programming a PLC in IEC61131-3 Structured text. Contains usage of operators and common functions.

ST.xhtml: addTwoInts := int1 + int2;
addTwoNumbers := int1 + int2;
addTwoIntsST := int1 + int2;
checkBit_bitmask := (bits AND SHL(1, bitToCheck)) <> 0;
bits := bits OR SHL(UINT#1, bitToSet);
bits := bits AND NOT SHL(UINT#1, bitToClear-1);
